Paper.Title: Language Independent NER using a Unified Model of Internal and Contextual Evidence

Section.Paragraph: This paper investigates the use of a language independent model for named entity recognition based on iterative learning in a co-training fashion, using word-internal and contextual information as independent evidence sources. Its bootstrapping process begins with only seed entities and seed contexts extracted from the provided annotated corpus.
F-measure exceeds 77 in Spanish and 72 in Dutch.
